title: Analyzing a Facebook-fueled anti-vaccination attack: 'It's not all about autism'

title_detail.value: Analyzing a Facebook-fueled anti-vaccination attack: 'It's not all about autism'

summary: Pitt scientists find a viral anti-vaccination Facebook campaign wasn't 'all about autism,' but instead centered on four distinct themes.

summary_detail.value: Pitt scientists find a viral anti-vaccination Facebook campaign wasn't 'all about autism,' but instead centered on four distinct themes.
